_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: ElDewrito
author: admin@novaserver.xyz
description: Server for the modified version of Halo Online named ElDewrito.

installation.script:
cd /mnt/server
mkdir config logs
if [ ! -d defaults ]; then
mkdir defaults
echo -e "Downloading default configuration files"
curl -o ./defaults/dewrito_prefs.cfg https://raw.githubusercontent.com/NovaMC/pterodactyl-eldewrito/master/defaults/dewrito_prefs.cfg
curl -o ./defaults/veto.json https://raw.githubusercontent.com/NovaMC/pterodactyl-eldewrito/master/defaults/veto.json
curl -o ./defaults/voting.json https://raw.githubusercontent.com/NovaMC/pterodactyl-eldewrito/master/defaults/voting.json
fi
if [ ! -f start.sh ]; then
echo -e "Downloading startup script"
curl -o start.sh https://raw.githubusercontent.com/NovaMC/pterodactyl-eldewrito/master/start.sh
chmod +x start.sh
fi
